price: Kuma yanã abin karãtu Mun rarraba shi dõmin ka karanta shi ga mutane a kan jinkiri kuma Mun sassaukar da shi sassaukarwa.*
arabic: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا
footnotes: * Saukar da Alƙur'ãni a cikin shekaru ashirin ko ashirin da uku ya yi kama da saukar ãyõyin Mũsã tãre a lõkacin da yake kiran Fir'auna zuwa ga addini.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqur'ānan faraqnāhu litaqra-ahu ʿalā al-nāsi ʿalā muk'thin wanazzalnāhu tanzīlan
